general.name: getRawFile
general.shortDesc: Fetches a remote file via HTTP request.

definition.desc: Given an absolute URL to a file, getRawFile makes a HTTP request via the specified port to retrieve the contents of the file.

params.name: url
params.desc: Url to the file to retrieve.

definition.return: If the function succeeds, returns true. Otherwise, it returns false and sets the error code according to the error occurred.
